remarks: Core content of orginal proof of ~ frege70 minus implicit removal of the change of variables.  Proposition 70 of [Frege1879] p. 58.  (Contributed by RP, 28-Mar-2020.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
frege70b $p |- ( R hereditary A -> [ x / y ] ( y e. A -> A. z ( y R z -> z e. A ) ) ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d R y z $.
